isString: This field must be a string
isInt: This field must be an integer
isBoolean: This field must be a boolean
isDateString: This field must be a valid date string
isNumber: This field must be a number
minLength: This field must be at least {min} characters long
maxLength: This field must be no longer than {max} characters
isUUID: This field must be a valid UUID
min: This field must be at least {min}
max: This field must be no more than {max}
matches: This field must match the required pattern
EMAIL_EXIST: This Email is used by another user
USER_NAME_EXIST: This user name is used by another user
isObject: This field must be an object
isEnum: This field must be one of the following values: {values}
